description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to notes in the application, including response shapes and request payloads for creating and updating notes.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the shape of a note when sent in an API response, including properties like Id, Title, Content, timestamps, and optional Accent.

classes.name: CreateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the payload required to create a new note, including validation attributes.

classes.name: UpdateNoteRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the payload to update an existing note, including validation attributes.
